solution_line_template: The number of black shirts is {packs_black_shirts} * {shirts_per_pack_black} = <<{packs_black_shirts}*{shirts_per_pack_black}={num_black_shirts}>>{num_black_shirts}.
The number of yellow shirts is {packs_yellow_shirts} * {shirts_per_pack_yellow} = <<{packs_yellow_shirts}*{shirts_per_pack_yellow}={num_yellow_shirts}>>{num_yellow_shirts}.
